Rexpansive

It is a stand-alone Drag & Drop page builder plugin that works with any WordPress theme. Create a unique and creative layout in relax, thanks to expansion which lets you enlarge or move photos, texts and videos, without having to set anything up.

Learn More

[/RexpansiveBlock][RexpansiveBlock id="block_0_3" type="empty" col="12" row="1" size_x="1" size_y="6" color_bg_block="" image_bg_block="" id_image_bg_block="" type_bg_block="" photoswipe="" linkurl="" empty_block_backend_fix="true"][/RexpansiveBlock][/RexpansiveSection]

item.title: 07 - Background Image + Title and Text
item.dc:creator: b2328
item.content:encoded:
[RexpansiveSection section_name="" type="perfect-grid" color_bg_section="" color_bg_section_active="true" dimension="full" image_bg_section_active="true" image_bg_section="https://neweb.info/plugins/rexpansive/demo/wp-content/uploads/2018/10/samuel-zeller-158996-unsplash.jpg" id_image_bg_section="1436" video_bg_url_section="" video_bg_id_section="" video_bg_url_vimeo_section="" full_height="false" block_distance="20" layout="fixed" responsive_background="" custom_classes="" section_width="100%" row_separator_top="20" row_separator_bottom="20" row_separator_right="20" row_separator_left="20" margin="" row_margin_top="0" row_margin_bottom="0" row_margin_right="0" row_margin_left="0" row_active_photoswipe="" row_overlay_color="rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.513)" row_overlay_active="true" rexlive_section_id="szww" rexlive_model_id="3228" rexlive_model_name="07 - Background Image + Title and Text" row_edited_live="true"][RexpansiveBlock id="block_13_1" rexbuilder_block_id="JE6t" type="text" size_x="8" size_y="5" row="1" col="3" gs_start_h="5" gs_width="8" gs_height="5" gs_y="0" gs_x="2" element_real_fluid="0" color_bg_block="" color_bg_block_active="true" image_bg_block="" id_image_bg_block="" image_bg_elem_active="" video_bg_id="" video_mp4_url="" video_bg_url="" video_bg_url_vimeo="" type_bg_block="" image_size="" photoswipe="" linkurl="" block_custom_class="" block_padding="5px;5px;5px;5px;" overlay_block_color="" overlay_block_color_active="false" zak_background="" zak_side="" zak_title="" zak_icon="" zak_foreground="" block_animation="fadeInUpBig" video_has_audio="0" block_has_scrollbar="false" block_dimensions_live_edited="" block_flex_position="center middle" block_flex_img_position=""]

The Page Builder 
with advanced resizing. 

Expansion will allow you to quickly resize photos, texts, videos and much more, on an advanced matrix, which will help you correct alignments, placements and much more, effectively guaranteeing a balance between creativity and design and avoiding annoying attempts to make adjustments.

[/RexpansiveBlock][RexpansiveBlock id="block_12_2" type="empty" col="1" row="1" size_x="2" size_y="5" color_bg_block="" image_bg_block="" id_image_bg_block="" type_bg_block="" photoswipe="" linkurl="" empty_block_backend_fix="true"][/RexpansiveBlock][RexpansiveBlock id="block_12_3" type="empty" col="11" row="1" size_x="2" size_y="5" color_bg_block="" image_bg_block="" id_image_bg_block="" type_bg_block="" photoswipe="" linkurl="" empty_block_backend_fix="true"][/RexpansiveBlock][/RexpansiveSection]
